item.description:
Join other single professionals for an early evening happy hour, topped off with 7-10 rounds of "mini-dates." You'll meet each member of the opposite sex for 5 minutes each, turn in your dating card and then we'll send you the contact info of your mutual matches 48 hours later. On average, 80% of those who attend end up with at least one or two mutual matches.

If you don't get any matches, you'll receive a promo code so you can try another event at half price!

PAYMENT POLICY - PREPAYMENT ONLY!!
$25 (MUST register with code MOXIENEW)

$23 IF YOU REGISTER WITH A FRIEND

REGISTER AND PAY HERE: http://moxiespeeddateboston.eventbrite.com/

 

PLEASE REMEMBER:
* We run 3 Meetup Groups, plus maintain our own outside Dating Advice & Events Website. We advertise on Facebook, Twitter, Blogs, etc. Most registrations come through our outside events website, not Meetup. Therefore the number of RSVPs reflected here are NOT the total number of men or women registered.

Here's why you should try speeddating:

1. You Improve Your Flirting & Communication skills - You went out, you interacted with people, you worked your flirt a bit. One's inability to interact or communicate effectively is one of the biggest hurdles when it comes to dating.

2. You Hone Your Dating Instincts -   The more exposure you have to such different types of people, the quicker you learn to spot and avoid red flags or incompatibility. You become better at picking up clues and signs.

3. You Build a Network - You meet new people who might not be a love match but could introduce you to one - The more you get out there, the more people you meet. Speeddating is also a great way to make new friends, people to include you in their socical circle and can introduce you to others.

 

See other RSVPS posted on our other groups. Please note that many people opt NOT to RSVP through Meetup for privacy reasons.

group.name: Boston New In Town Meetup Group

item.name: SpeedDating for Single Professionals - Ages 32-44
